column1: #Text=Gun control campaigner Sarah Brady dies aged 73
#Text=Sarah Brady , pictured far right in 2006Image : White House .
#Text=Sarah Brady , gun control campaigner and widow of former US White House Press Secretary James Brady , has died at the age of 73 .
#Text=Her death was announced by the Brady Campaign and Center to Prevent Gun Violence .
#Text=Brady died on Friday after a battle with pneumonia according to e-mails sent by her family .
#Text=A statement by the Brady Campaign and Center to Prevent Gun Violence was posted on Facebook .
#Text=It said " We are heartbroken over the loss of Sarah Brady , our dear friend and Chairperson of the Brady Campaign and Center to Prevent Gun Violence .

#Text=Brady said  the proudest moment of our lives " was in 1993 when President Bill Clinton signed into effect the Brady Bill , tightening gun law legislation .

column1: #Text=Former First Lady Nancy Reagan released a statement regarding the death of her " dear friend " Sarah Brady .
#Text=She said " Over the years , I found her to be a woman of immense courage , strength and optimism .

#Text=Giffords , who was was shot in the head and nearly killed in 2011 , said  We know Sarah will be missed by all those whose lives she touched and who were so inspired by her commitment to her late husband Jim and to the cause of reducing gun violence in our country[ ... ]
